plugins.name: Styled Components
plugins.description: Utilising tagged template literals (a recent addition to JavaScript) and the power of CSS, styled-components allows you to write actual CSS code to style your components.

plugins.name: ESLint
plugins.description: A pluggable and configurable linter tool for identifying and reporting on patterns in JavaScript. Maintain your code quality with ease.

plugins.name: Prettier
plugins.description: An opinionated code formatter; Supports many languages; Integrates with most editors.

plugins.name: lint-staged
plugins.description: The concept of lint-staged is to run configured linter (or other) tasks on files that are staged in git.

plugins.name: Github Actions
plugins.description: GitHub Actions makes it easy to automate all your software workflows, now with world-class CI/CD. Build, test, and deploy your code right from GitHub.
